snippet: Red Bulls defender Jamison Olave was suspended two games and fined by Major League Soccer for “violent conduct” toward an opponent during Wednesday night’s 1-1 tie with Real Salt Lake.
abstract: New York Red Bulls defender Jamison Olave is suspended for two games and fined by Major League Soccer for 'violent conduct' during 1-1 tie with Real Salt Lake.
lead_paragraph: Red Bulls defender Jamison Olave was suspended two games and fined by Major League Soccer for “violent conduct” toward an opponent during Wednesday night’s 1-1 tie with Real Salt Lake.
